resources.string: oyy... Having you as my friend is privilage to me..you are the only guy who bare my stupidness People come and go but true friends always stay YAPPIEE YAPPIEE BIRTHDAY my dear friend,lets continue doing all the stupid things we do together for life. may the bright colours paint your life and you be happy forever..stay blessed I wish you all the best...to get successful in your life achieving your dreams..good luck dear.........
